properties.name: oauth2.clientId
properties.description: Application client id provides access to OAuth2 server.

properties.name: oauth2.clientSecret
properties.description: Application secret provides access to OAuth2 server.

properties.name: oauth2.refreshTokenExpiredTime
properties.description: Time to expire JWT refresh token.

properties.name: oauth2.RSAPublicKey
properties.description: RSA public key used to resolve token.

properties.name: oauth2.RSAPrivateKey
properties.description: RSA private key used to sign token.
